title: How to Make Haitian Egg Nog

steps.headline: Mix evaporated milk and the sweetened condense milk in bowl, whisk until well blended.
Add cream of coconut, almond extract, vanilla extract, cinnamon, nutmeg the anise and the lime juice to the bowl of Eggnog.
Add the rum to the bowl of ingredients last, if you are serving this to a bunch of adults.

text: Mix evaporated milk and the sweetened condense milk in bowl, whisk until well blended.  Add cream of coconut, almond extract, vanilla extract, cinnamon, nutmeg the anise and the lime juice to the bowl of Eggnog.  Stir the nog mix well.  Add the rum to the bowl of ingredients last, if you are serving this to a bunch of adults.
